Player History
Drafted in 14th round, 220th overall pick, by Seattle in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/2/2015, off Antonio Montejano (BOS)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/19/2015, off Valentine Tucker (NY)...
Injured on 4/26/2015 with a Torn Rib Cage Muscle, out for 6 weeks...
Injured on 7/11/2015 with a Inflamed Hip Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 5/6/2016 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/26/2016, hitting .429 with 1 HR, 9 RBI...
Injured on 9/29/2016 with a Broken Hand, out for 6 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 2/2/2018 to a 1-year deal worth $2,750,000 per year...
Injured on 5/27/2018 with a Concussion, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 7/12/2018 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 2/4/2019 to a 1-year deal worth $1,000,000 per year...
Injured on 5/31/2019 with a Inflamed Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 5-6 weeks...
